question: Paying money for graveyard maintenance. i visited graveyard, its keeper requested me for water tank. He will use the water for cleaning graveyard and for the plants. Will i get reward if i pay to him?
answer:
QUESTION
My dearest friend has died last week. When i visited graveyard, its keeper requested me for water tank because there is very shortage of water in the area. He will use the water for cleaning graveyard and for the plants. Will i get reward if i pay to him ?
ANSWER


Share:
You may donate the water tank on behalf of your friend for the maintenance
of the graveyard. Insha Allah, both of you will be rewarded.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
